note.p: Birth: Cecil Street, London, England (23 March 1767)
Burial: In the family vault, Windsor, Berkshire
Education: Charterhouse, Surrey; St John's College, Cambridge, AB (1788), AM (1791); MB (1792); MD (1795)
Career: Fellow of St John's College, Cambridge; Physician, St George's Hospital, London (1793-1803); Physician in Ordinary to the Queen (1806) and to George III (1809)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Charterhouse Miscellany
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1845 No 62 pp 576-577
